articles.title: ECB unleashes $600 billion in new stimulus to prop up Europe's economy - CNN
articles.description: The European Central Bank is expanding its huge money-printing program by hundreds of billions of euros, an attempt to prop up the economy as another wave of coronavirus rips through the region and threatens to derail its fragile recovery.

articles.author: Taylor Locke
articles.title: Kevin O'Leary: 'Day trading isn't investing. It's gambling' – invest like Warren Buffett instead - CNBC
articles.description: "I have no problem with day trading," Kevin O'Leary said, "but to me, you can go to Las Vegas or you can day trade. Same thing."
articles.content:
Throughout the pandemic, day trading has become extremely popular, especially among young people who, in most cases, have never invested in the stock market before.

articles.author: Evelyn Cheng
articles.title: Fitch upgrades its China growth forecast for 2021 - CNBC
articles.description: Fitch Ratings raised its forecast for China's economic growth next year based on increased domestic demand and expectations of coronavirus vaccine deployment.
articles.content:
BEIJING Fitch Ratings raised its forecast this week for China's economic growth next year, based on increased domestic demand and expectations for coronavirus vaccine deployment.
